name: Playpen
description: Client and her husband are low-income earners with two children currently attending preschool. The family is seeking donors who are willing to contribute a playpen for their young children.

passiton.name: Playpen / Cot
passiton.description:
- rarely used as it was an extra set
- can be used as cot or playpen

name: Laptop
description: Client is an amputee with multiple health conditions. He intends to use the laptop to search for jobs and also pursue ad-hoc design work to find new meaning for his life.

passiton.name: Laptop sleeve (for 11.6 inch laptop) - Black
passiton.description:
Form-fitting sleeve with quick top-loading access. Brand new unused.

Precise fit for laptops and ultrabooks with a 11.6 inch display

Slim design allows you to carry the case by itself or in a bag dimensions: 11" x 8.5" x 0.4" (LxWxH inches)

See https://a.co/d/hjkVCkF

name: Laptop
description: A senior living alone with limited financial resources, facing the challenges of chronic health conditions and a high risk of falling. Her current laptop is no longer working, and she relies on it to store precious memories in photos and daily journal, as she is deeply concerned about losing her memory. This laptop is not just a tool for her, it is helping her maintain a sense of connection to her past and offers comfort in difficult days. Unfortunately, due to her health struggles, she is unable to work and support herself in obtaining a new one. Please contact me at 9654 6514. Thank you.

name: Bicycle
description:
The client is a single mom of 6 children, ages from 2 year old to 10 years old.

The client has been unemployed for more than 6 months but managed to secure a job as a factory operator recently. She also wants to work as an ad hoc delivery rider during her free time to earn additional income to support her family but needs a bicycle as a tool of transportation.

In addition, due to the lack of financial support from her ex-husband, formula milk and diapers are a real strain on her budget.  Any donation of toddler formula or diapers would be a huge help and would allow the client to focus on her job.

passiton.name: Bicycle helmet
passiton.description: Delivery on weekday evening and weekend.

name: Laptop
description: A single mother of 1 young son is in need of laptop as she wished to apply for a computer course to increase her chance of being employed.

name: Sofa
description: Client is a 20-year-old mother of one. She is married, but husband is pending his sentence for suspected involvement in criminal activities. Given her husband's role as the sole provider for the family while she provides care for their 1-year-old child, client's family is currently struggling financially.

passiton.name: Black leather sofa
passiton.description: Still in good condition except that Sofa has some peeling seen but Can use sofa cover. It’s been only 2 years using it since we are shifting house soon hence passing it on.
passiton.location: Eunos, Geylang, Kembangan, Paya Lebar , Sims

passiton.name: 3 seater recliner sofa in leather
passiton.description: Well used but in v good condition. It has usb a ports at the sides. Both seats can be fully reclined. A little discolouration on the left seat, it’s not peeling.

passiton.name: Brown leather 3 seater sofa
passiton.location: Bouna Vista, Clementi, Dover, Hong Leong Garden, Pasir Panjang, West Coast

name: Laptop
description: The family consists of six members, with the eldest child holding a student pass. Due to the high school fees and lack of subsidies, the family is not eligible for funding to purchase a laptop. A functional laptop is essential to support the eldest child's academic needs, as well as the schoolwork and other applications required by the remaining children. Additionally, the laptop would benefit the entire family, including assisting the parents in managing tasks such as job applications.
